definitions.title: n.pr.m.
definitions.body: (salvation of Yah; cf. [[אֱלִישָׁע]] p. 46 supr.; [[ישעאל]] on scarab C1Gann:JAs 1883, Fev.-Mars, 135, No. 8)—
Isaiah, son of ’Amôṣ, the prophet: Is 1:1 + 15 t. Is., 2Ki 19:2 + 12 t. K., 2Ch 26:22, 2Ch 32:20, 2Ch 32:32, LXX Hcaiav, Vulgate Isaias. †
one of the children of Jeduthun 1Ch 25:3, 1Ch 25:15, LXX Isaia, etc. †
a Levite ancestor of one of David's treasurers 1Ch 26:25, LXX Wsaiav, LXXL Iwshe.
